name: Vault (Demo)
description:
Fly through the serene skies of the Vault and discover ancient monuments and writings from lost avian civilizations.

The clouds, gemeralds, structures, and texts are all procedurally generated.
As you play, your player model will change based on your actions.

Controls:
Flight:
  Use the mouse to change direction
  Hold right click and move the mouse to roll
  Hold left click for a forward boost
  Press Tab to open/close your inventory
  Press Escape to quit
Walking:
  Use the mouse to change direction
  Use WASD to move
  Press Space to jump and return to flight

Notes:
Your player model will change depending on how you play. At the moment, it is only based on what elevations you tend to fly at, but later it will be based on more significant mechanics tied to each lost civilization.
In the current build, there are a few unique types of structures to find. Some of these have procedurally generated text. Collide with the glowing bubble to show the text on screen.
